$name is, for this fleeting moment in time, at the place we want them to be! That is, at the perfect alignment between skill and challenge. This may mean that they are in a good place, growing optimally, feeling hungry for more and enjoying maximum work satisfaction!

However, donâ€™t let this cause complacency in you or your report. At any moment in the future, one small misstep can cause them to dip into anxiety or boredom. Celebrate this moment and plan the next steps with your report to see which dials can be turned up to 10 in an effort to replicate this win!
